name: EPS Series Vol. 4: Noise Reduction: Tomoa Yamamoto
overview: Tomoa Yamamoto - Noise Reduction is the fourth disc in the EPS music series made by Antinos Records that features: - CD Player: Play the 2 sides of the single with the songs "Noise Reduction", "Portable radio-life" and the remix of "Noise Reduction". - Video Editor: Edit the video with the game video editor. - Photo Menu: Browse through three different photo galleries - ESP Original Video: Play the song's video
